Class DecacErrorListner

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.ensimag.deca.syntax.DecacErrorListner

    org.antlr.v4.runtime.ANTLRErrorListener

    public class DecacErrorListner
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.antlr.v4.runtime.ANTLRErrorListener
    Error listener that stops the compilation at the first error usuing ParseCancellationException.
    Author:
    Ensimag
